description: Fires when a video content segment completes playing within a video player. That is, position and total length are equal.

assetId.description: The unique ID of the content asset.

camId.description: ID of the camera the video content is from.

camName.description: Name of the camera the video content is from.

description.description: Short description of the video content.

fullEpisode.description: true if content is a full episode and false otherwise.

fullScreen.description: true if playback is currently in full screen mode and false otherwise.

genre.description: The genre of the content (i.e., comedy, action, etc).

highlight.description: Whether or not the video content is a Cam Highlight.

keywords.description: An array of arbitrary keywords or tags that describe or categorize the video content.

livestream.description: If the content will be a livetream, send true, otherwise false.

playerSessionId.description: The unique ID of the overall session used to tie all events generated from a specific playback. This value should be same across all playback, content, and ad events if they are from the same playback session.

podId.description: The unique ID of the content pod.

position.description: The current index position in seconds of the playhead into the content/asset. This position must exclude the duration of any ads played.

program.description: The name of the program, show, etc. of the content if applicable (e.g., Surf Your Best).

rewind.description: Whether or not the video content is a Cam Rewind.

spotId.description: ID of the spot where camera is located.

spotName.description: Name of the spot where camera is located.

subregionName.description: Name of the sub-region where camera is located.

surflineSession.description: Whether or not the video content is a Surfline Session.

title.description: The title of the video content.

totalLength.description: The total duration of the content/asset in seconds. This should exclude the duration of any ads included in the playback of this asset. For livestream playback, send null.
